metadata.dc:author: Cejas, H A
Rodriguez, A
Martínez, M
Reusa, M J
metadata.dc:description: Two epithelial-myoepithelial carcinoma of parotid gland from two female patients of 48 and 80 years old, and normal gland tissue, are studied with Del Río Hortega-Polak silver impregnation technique. It is a selective and alternative method to mark myoepithelial cells in sections of paraffin embedding material or in frozen sections.
metadata.dc:title: Carcinoma epitelial-mioepitelial--técnica para identificar células mioepiteliales.
[Epithelial-myoepithelial carcinoma--a technique to identify myoepithelial cells].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de la Facultad de Ciencias Medicas (Cordoba, Argentina)
